details.description: The script is a SLURM script, designed to run on a high-performance computing (HPC) cluster managed by SLURM. It defines various SLURM options to configure the job execution environment.

scripts.artifact_estimator.py: This script appears to be a Python script used for artifact estimation. It's called with the argument '--num-nodes 1' indicating single-node execution and additional arguments passed through the '$@' variable. This suggests the script utilizes multiple nodes for processing.
scripts.run.py: This is another Python script, executed with the argument 'nodes=3' indicating a multi-node setup. It also takes additional arguments passed through '$1'.
